long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your learning journey by tracking your progress with the dynamic visual aid of a heat map and staying motivated with our streak counter. Keep up the great work in your studies!

User Guide
- install the extension
- refresh chrome (may need to restart chrome)
- navigate to the "Previous Tests" page on https://apps.uworld.com/
- best practice: select 100 for "Items per page" at the bottom right
- click on the extension image in the top bar
- refresh chrome and the extension until data populates
